title: Assignment of functions by governor; report
context: §27-2 Assignment of functions by governor; report. The governor may assign the functions in section 27-1, except the administration and operation of district courts, to such respective department or departments as can most appropriately and effectively perform the functions. [L 1965, c 97, §2; Supp, §14B-2; HRS §27-2] Cross References Transfer of district courts to the judiciary branch, see L 1965, c 97, §21.
